text: Boule de Suif () is a 1934 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Romm.Пышка"Пышка" It stars Galina Sergeyeva, Andrey Fayt, and Faina Ranevskaya. == Actors == * Galina Sergeyeva as Mlle. Elizabeth Rousset (Boule- de-suif) * Andrey Fayt as Prussian Officer * Faina Ranevskaya as Mme. Loiseau * Pyotr Repnin as Lamadon, miller * Tatyana Okunevskaya as Mme Carre-Lamadon * Mikhail Mukhin as Count de Breville == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1934 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Romm
title: Boule de Suif (1934 movie)
